2026-0080
2026-02-03ESDCDepartment of Employment and Social Development ActReappointment of a part-time member of the Social Security TribunalReappointment of Melanie Teresa Petrunia of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a part-time member of the Social Security Tribunal, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective May 3, 2026.N/A
act: Department of Employment and Social Development Act
subject: Reappointment of a part-time member of the Social Security Tribunal
precis: Reappointment of Melanie Teresa Petrunia of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a part-time member of the Social Security Tribunal, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective May 3, 2026.
